text: Kono mahaka pichuraa'i diyato haiche kerala kupharaita brd'dhi sadhana karaa, iyara dbaraa kaphirasakalaka bibhraanta karaa haya. Sihamte iyaka kono bacharata baidha karae akau kono bacharata abaidha karae yate sihamte allahe yiboraka nisid'dha karaiche se'iborara ganana purna karaiba parae; phalata allahe yi haraama karaiche seya sihamte halala karae. Sihamtara beya karmabora sihamtara babe sobhaniya karai diya haiche, arau allahe kaphira sampradayaka hidayata nidiye
